p: In contrast, the U.S. has prioritized people aged 65 years and older and long-term care facility residents to receive COVID-19 vaccines. However, COVID-19 vaccines have not been tested in clinical trials in these frail older adults ( 2). Pharmacovigilance examines adverse events of drugs or vaccines in populations but this information on COVID-19 vaccines is limited. This study estimated the mortality rate of COVID-19 vaccination and presented characteristics of deaths following COVID-19 vaccination and top reported comorbidities and medications associated with deaths in the U.S.
